rows: Detailed explanation of the loan purpose. Field is visible when loan type is not "Credit cards," "Auto loans," "Lines of credit."
Total loan amount issued to the customer.
Currency in which the loan is issued.
Annual percentage rate for the loan.
Interest rate defined for the loan.
Date when the loan was opened.
html:
Field

Description

Purpose

Purpose of the loan.

Purpose details

Detailed explanation of the loan purpose. Field is visible when loan type is not "Credit cards," "Auto loans," "Lines of credit."

Loan amount

Total loan amount issued to the customer.

Currency

Currency in which the loan is issued.

APR, %

Annual percentage rate for the loan.

Interest rate, %

Interest rate defined for the loan.

Opened on

Date when the loan was opened.

Maturity date

Loan maturity date.

Term, months

Loan term specified in months.
